Package coms309.trailtraveler.backend.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
coms309.trailtraveler.backend.controller.UserController
@RestController public class UserController extends Object
The UserController class handles http requests from the frontend of the application and depends on the UserService class.

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("user/all") List<coms309.trailtraveler.backend.model.User> getAllUsers()
      Returns a list of every user in the user repository.
      Returns:
      The list of all users within the user repository.

    • getUserByUsername

      @GetMapping("user/username/{username}") coms309.trailtraveler.backend.model.User getUserByUsername​(@PathVariable String username)
      Returns a user whos username matches the given username. This is used by the frontend for checking login information.
      Parameters:
      username - The username that will be compared with every user's username in the repository.
      Returns:
      The User object in which the given username matches.

    • getUserByEmail

      @GetMapping("user/email/{email}") coms309.trailtraveler.backend.model.User getUserByEmail​(@PathVariable String email)
      Returns a user whos username matches the given email. This is used by the frontend for checking login information.
      Parameters:
      email - The email that will be compared with every user's email in the repository
      Returns:
      The user object associated with the given email.

    • postUserByPath

      @PostMapping("user/post/{email}/{username}/{password}") coms309.trailtraveler.backend.model.User postUserByPath​(@PathVariable String email, @PathVariable String username, @PathVariable String password)
      Adds a user object with the given parameters to the user repository.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to be added to the repository.
      username - The username of the user to be added to the repository.
      password - The password of the user to be added to the repository.
      Returns:
      If successful, returns the User object of the user just posted to the repository.
